mapper.select: SELECT s.*, a.ac_name, hr.emp_name FROM sale s LEFT JOIN human_resource hr ON hr.emp_id = s.emp_id LEFT JOIN accounts a ON a.ac_id = s.ac_id WHERE s.status != 99
mapper.insert: insert into sale (emp_id, ac_id, order_date, due_date, total_price, status) values (#{emp_id}, #{ac_id}, #{order_date}, #{due_date}, #{total_price}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.order_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(s.total_price) AS total_price_sum FROM sale s WHERE s.status = 2 AND s.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.order_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(s.order_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') THEN s.total_price END), 0) AS this_month_sale, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(s.order_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') THEN s.total_price END), 0) AS last_month_sale FROM sale s WHERE s.status = 2
